c:attribute.description: Platform-owned first name on the billing account.

c:attribute.name: billingLastName
c:attribute.description: Platfrom-owned last name on the billing account.

c:attribute.name: billingCCType
c:attribute.description: Platform-owned type of CC on the billing account.

c:attribute.name: billingCCLast4
c:attribute.description: Platform-owned last 4 digits of the CC on the billing account

c:attribute.name: billingStreet1
c:attribute.description: Platform-owned street address on the billing account

c:attribute.name: billingStreet2
c:attribute.description: Platform-owned street address on the billing account

c:attribute.name: billingCity
c:attribute.description: Platform-owned city on the billing account's address

c:attribute.name: billingState
c:attribute.description: Platform-owned state on the billing account's address

c:attribute.name: billingZip
c:attribute.description: Platform-owned zip code on the billing account's address

c:attribute.name: billingZipPlusFour

c:attribute.name: owner

c:method.name: SignupTransition
c:method.description: Send a state transition to indicate where in the sign-up process the account is

c:parameter.name: stepcompleted
c:parameter.description: The last step the account has completed during the signup process

c:method.name: UpdateBillingInfoCC
c:method.description: Updates billing info that contains Credit Card information using a token from ReCurly.

c:method.name: SkipPremiumTrial
c:method.description: Method invoked to inform the platform that the user has explicitly decided to skip the premium trial.

c:method.name: CreateBillingAccount
c:method.description: Create a users billing account and sets up the initial subscription

c:parameter.name: placeID
c:parameter.description: Place ID to associate the initial subscription to

c:method.name: UpdateServicePlan
c:method.description: Updates the subscription level and addons for the specified place ID.

c:parameter.name: placeID
c:parameter.description: Place ID to associate the new service plan info with.

c:parameter.name: serviceLevel
c:parameter.description: The new service level for the specified place.

c:parameter.name: addons
c:parameter.description: Map of addons to booleans indicating if the addon is active for the specified place.

c:method.name: AddPlace
c:method.description: Adds a place for this account

c:parameter.name: place
c:parameter.description: Instance of the writable place model attributes represented as a map

c:parameter.name: population
c:parameter.description: The ID of the population that the place will be a member of. If not provided the place will be part of the general population

c:parameter.name: serviceLevel
c:parameter.description: The service level the new place will be at.

c:parameter.name: addons
c:parameter.description: Map of addons to booleans indicating if the addon will be actived for the new place.

c:method.name: Delete
c:method.description: Deletes an account with optional removal of the login

c:parameter.name: deleteOwnerLogin
c:parameter.description: When set to true will also remove the login for the owner of the account, false will leave it. If not specified, defaults to false

c:method.name: DelinquentAccountEvent
c:method.description: An account has be marked Delinquent

c:parameter.name: accountId
c:parameter.description: The account id for the deliquent invoice

c:method.name: IssueCredit
c:method.description: Creates a credit adjustment using ReCurly.

c:parameter.name: amountInCents
c:parameter.description: The amount to credit. Must be a negative amount of cents

c:parameter.name: description
c:parameter.description: The reason for the credit, or empty

c:method.name: IssueInvoiceRefund
c:method.description: Creates a refund of an entire invoice using ReCurly.

c:method.name: Activate
c:method.description: Method invoked to signal that account signup is complete.
